ResearchProjectDef.label: Phytotech
ResearchProjectDef.description: By utilizing spacer componenets and Fibril fibers, a surrogate (and parasitic!) limb or organ can be created. Side Effects include: increased caloric consumption, feelings of hunger, slight discomfort at install site and increased presence of bugs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fibril Planting
ResearchProjectDef.description: The basics of how to grow and harvest Fibril.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Phytotech Maintenence Tools
ResearchProjectDef.description: For use ONLY with approved Phytotech brand heavy equipment.
